content:
有这个XP的知友可以尝试用AI生成自己的性转肖像试试看。

首先大家可以登录这个平台，来线上使用comfyui

宝子们，我发现一个AI图像视频宝藏产品 RunningHub！全球ComfyUI 开发者每天在此发布数百个超有趣超有用的AI应用，娱乐工作一网打尽。打开链接：https://www.runninghub.ai/?inviteCode=ob5dqdf2 注册领500RH币可以免费生成好多图片视频哦！

第一步，生成自己的性转形象。

使用这个工作流，https://www.runninghub.ai/post/1962504857267646465

原理是调用Banana模型，来改变人物形象。

男变女参考提示词：

版本 A — 双马尾（原始基准）

Ultra realistic portrait of a beautiful young woman transformed from the male reference image, perfectly preserving identical facial structure and features (eye shape, nose, jawline, lips, skin tone, facial proportions), hairstyle: twin ponytails with soft natural strands, same background, lighting, and camera composition, same clothing style translated into feminine form (fitted blouse and skirt matching the male’s shirt and pants), photorealistic smooth skin with subtle pores and soft light reflections, gentle and confident expression, 8k ultra-detailed render, cinematic depth of field, (consistent facial features:1.5), (identity preserved:1.4), (realistic skin texture:1.2), (soft lighting:1.1), (clothing style continuity:1.2), (background consistency:1.3)

Negative prompt: male, nude body, overexaggerated body, unrealistic proportions, distorted face, wrong lighting, inconsistent background, cartoon, anime, 3d render, CGI, low resolution, identity loss, mutation, extra limbs, warped clothing, expressionless, deformed eyes, over-retouched, unnatural makeup, artifact

版本 B — 长直发（自然顺发）

Ultra realistic portrait of a beautiful young woman transformed from the male reference image, preserving identical facial structure and features (eye shape, nose, jawline, lips, skin tone), hairstyle: long straight silky hair with soft side part, same background, lighting, and outfit style translated to feminine form (fitted blouse and skirt matching the male’s shirt and pants), photorealistic natural skin texture, calm and confident look, cinematic lighting, (consistent facial features:1.5), (identity preserved:1.4), (realistic hair:1.2), (soft lighting:1.1), (background consistency:1.3)

Negative prompt: male, distorted face, overexaggerated body, unrealistic lighting, inconsistent background, cartoon, anime, CGI, identity loss, deformed hair, over-retouched, artifact

版本 C — 中长波浪卷发（温柔自然风）

Ultra realistic portrait of a beautiful young woman transformed from the male reference image, perfectly preserving facial structure (eyes, nose, jawline, lips, skin tone), hairstyle: medium-length wavy hair with loose curls softly framing the face, same environment and lighting, same clothing style adapted to feminine form, natural soft smile, realistic skin details, cinematic depth of field, (consistent facial features:1.5), (identity preserved:1.4), (realistic hair:1.2), (soft lighting:1.2), (background consistency:1.3)

Negative prompt: male, unrealistic body, wrong lighting, distorted face, cartoon, anime, CGI, over-smoothed skin, identity loss, deformed hair, artifact, mismatch lighting

版本 D — 短发（干练职业风）

Ultra realistic portrait of a beautiful young woman transformed from the male reference image, preserving identical facial structure (eyes, nose, jawline, lips), hairstyle: neat short bob haircut with side part, same background and lighting, same outfit style in feminine form (office blouse and skirt matching male shirt and pants), realistic skin texture, confident and professional expression, high detail 8k portrait, (consistent facial features:1.5), (identity preserved:1.4), (realistic hair:1.2), (background consistency:1.3), (soft lighting:1.1)

Negative prompt: male, distorted face, identity loss, unrealistic body, cartoon, anime, CGI, artifact, over-smoothed skin, wrong proportions

版本 E — 高马尾（运动或青春感）

Ultra realistic portrait of a beautiful young woman transformed from the male reference image, preserving identical facial structure and proportions, hairstyle: high ponytail with loose strands and natural motion, same lighting and environment, same outfit style adapted to feminine form (smart casual blouse and skirt), realistic smooth skin, soft highlights, cinematic tone, (consistent facial features:1.5), (identity preserved:1.4), (realistic hair:1.2), (soft lighting:1.1), (background consistency:1.3)
Negative prompt: male, distorted face, unrealistic lighting, anime, cartoon, CGI, identity loss, over-retouched skin, wrong lighting, deformed hair
